name: Jain Joga
desc: Jain joga je bila centralna praksa u džainizmu. Jainova duhovnost zasniva se na strogom kodeksu nenasilja ili ahimsa (koji uključuje vegetarijanstvo), davanju alme (dana), ispravnoj veri u tri dragulja, praksi štednje (tapasa) kao što su post i jogijskim oblicima.

comments.author: Uros Isakovic
comments.text: There is always room for change, but you have to be open to that change.

comments.author: Nikola Barjaktarevic
comments.text: The very heart of yoga practice is 'abyhasa' – steady effort in the direction you want to go.
